scripts.setup: npm i && husky install && npm --prefix ./frontend i && npm --prefix ./backend i && npm --prefix ./admin i
scripts.dev: concurrently -n front,back,admin -c green,yellow,cyan -t "HH:mm:ss" -p "{name} {time}" "npm --prefix ./frontend run dev" "npm --prefix ./backend run dev" "npm --prefix ./admin run dev"
scripts.lint: npm --prefix ./frontend run lint && npm --prefix ./backend run lint && npm --prefix ./admin run lint
scripts.fix: npm --prefix ./frontend run fix && npm --prefix ./backend run fix && npm --prefix ./admin run fix
